title: American Cancer Society leverages Gitcoin for decentralized open-source cancer research funding
description:
In a move that blends innovation with philanthropy, the American Cancer Society (ACS) has embraced web3 technology by partnering with Gitcoin, a leading figure in open-source funding, according to a statement shared with CryptoSlate. This strategic collaboration signifies a milestone for the ACS as it steps into the decentralized world of web3, leveraging Gitcoin’s expertise […]

The post American Cancer Society leverages Gitcoin for decentralized open-source cancer research funding appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Circle Partners With SBI Holdings To Boost USDC Presence In Japan
description: Circle, the entity issuing the USDC stablecoin, has announced a partnership with Japanese securities and banking giant SBI Holdings in a bid to boost USDC circulation in Japan. The agreement was made in a memorandum of understanding (MOU) and requires SBI Holdings to register as an electronic payment services provider in Japan.

title: Scam crypto malware Inferno Drainer decides ‘to move on’ after stealing $80m
description: Multi-chain crypto scam service Inferno Drainer has halted its service ‘for good and won’t return again.’ A multi-chain cryptocurrency scam service Inferno Drainer is going dark “for good” after stealing $80 million from victims. According to a Telegram post published…

title: Tornado Cash’s token TORN plunges 45% following Binance delisting
description: Binance will delist Tornado Cash’s native token TORN on Dec. 7, 2023, as part of its review process. Crypto exchange Binance will cease support for deposits and withdrawals of TORN, a native token for crypto mixing service Tornado Cash, which…

title: Vitalik Buterin unveils major overhaul of Ethereum staking to enhance decentralization
description: Vitalik Buterin plans to overhaul ETH staking and has outlined the progression of Ethereum’s roadmap, particularly focusing on the forthcoming Dencun update. In a recent interview with the NFT platform Defiant while in Turkey, Ethereum’s co-founder Vitalik Buterin addressed the…
